item.title: Five Ways to Squeeze More ROI Out of Your Server Room
item.description: Servers are crucial for modern businesses as they manage internal and external data. While this service requires investment, a strategic approach to your server infrastructure can lead to long-term cost savings without affecting performance. Here are five methods to maximize your server room’s ROI. Prioritize Cooling: Efficient cooling is vital for managing server room energy costs. Servers generate significant heat, demanding more than just internal fans. Several factors, both inside and outside the cabinet, can impact cooling efficiency.
